description: Describe information needed for deposit module.
title: Deposit schema.

___created_by.name: created_by
___created_by.description: ID of user that created the deposit.
___created_by.title: Creator

___owners.name: owners
___owners.description: Owners of the deposit (a list of user's IDs).
___owners.title: Owners

___status.name: status
___status.description: Status of the deposit, either 'draft' or 'published'.
___status.title: Status

___id.name: id
___id.description: Identifier of the deposit - usually the value of corresponding 'depid'-type PID.
___id.title: Persistent Identifier of the deposit

___pid.name: pid
___pid.description: Identifier of the published record - usually the type and value of a 'recid'-type PID of the corresponding published record.
___pid.title: Persistent identifier of the published record

___type.description: Type of the PID, in correspondece with PID's 'pid_type' property.
___type.title: PID Type

___revision_id.description: ID of the RecordMetadata revision. Used for record merging.
___revision_id.title: Record Revision ID

___value.description: Value of the PID, in correspondece with PID's 'pid_value' property.
___value.title: PID Value

____files.name: _files
____files.description: Internal listing of files attached to deposit.
